summary: This is a Custodian Document Search Checklist form related to the legal hold notice for case INMATE DEATH / LHN-CIV-2019-00204, distributed on August 14, 2019. The form documents a custodian's search for potentially responsive documents across electronic files, hard copies, and other media in compliance with preservation requirements. It is marked as ATTORNEY CLIENT COMMUNICATION/PRIVILEGED.

events.title: Legal Hold Notice Distribution
events.description: A legal hold notice was distributed by counsel regarding the INMATE DEATH case, requiring preservation of potentially responsive documents.

keyFacts: The document is a compliance checklist for a legal hold related to case 'INMATE DEATH / LHN-CIV-2019-00204'.
The legal hold notice was distributed on August 14, 2019, instructing custodians not to destroy, discard, alter, or make inaccessible potentially responsive documents.
The form systematically inventories potential document locations including home drives, shared drives, emails, databases, hard copies, mobile devices, and social media.
The document is marked 'ATTORNEY CLIENT COMMUNICATION/PRIVILEGED' across multiple pages.
The custodian acknowledges responsibility to contact agency counsel if any responsive documents are discovered to have been altered or destroyed.
